price: 38.Kaadu Qaad deqsita maraay, Saamuud deqsita maraa kee Rassi deqsita qeelih тага finqisneh, kaadu wohuk fanal sinaamak maggo horaari finqisne sinni farmoytit dirabboysen waqdi.
arabic: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونَۢا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waʿādan wathamūdā wa-aṣḥāba al-rasi waqurūnan bayna dhālika kathīran
